text: @Yamiche Question for @VP re #WearAMask should be: Does #FreedomOfSpeech outweigh #Humanity? Or CARING for your family/friends & others? Ppl would #WearAMaskSaveALife if @realDonaldTrump enacted a law ie “mandatory to wear a SEATBELT” #Covid_19 #CoronavirusPandemic #TrumpLiedPeopleDied
